name: Rolling Skull - Addictive Game
description:
"Hi, I'm Mr. Bones and I'm lost all my star. Would you help me to roll in order to recover them?"

Rolling Skull is a unique platform puzzle game where you rotate the world to guide Mr. Bones to his lost stars.

This game contains 40 levels with 360º rolling madness and puzzle-packed fun.

Spin the world around you as you try to roll Mr. Bones around the puzzle collecting the stars.

Features amazing scene rotation mechanics. Just touch one side of the screen to rotate the world to this side.

Be careful not to fall out of the scene – or it’s game over!


Download it now and train your brain with this amazing arcade physics puzzle game.
